channel.title: Antitrust Regulation on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Antitrust Regulation on FinanClub

item.title: PINS
item.description: score:93 Chances: Two Pinterest directors have resigned from Nextdoor’s board of directors in response to U.S. Justice Department efforts to enforce antitrust rules, indicating the company’s willingness to comply with regulations. The company’s decision to have directors resign from boards of rival companies demonstrates a proactive approach to avoiding antitrust issues and maintaining a positive image.
